title: How to Give Stuff Away on Craigslist

steps.title: Click on "Post to classifieds" on the top left.
steps.content: Click on "Post to classifieds" on the top left.

steps.title: Select the category "For Sale" and continue.
steps.content: Select the category "For Sale" and continue.

steps.title: Create your post of what you want to give away.
steps.content: Create your post of what you want to give away.

steps.title: Check your email for the publish activation link.
steps.content: Check your email for the publish activation link.

steps.title: Do not include your street address.
steps.content: Do not include your street address.

steps.title: Wait for an email or call (if you leave a phone number)
steps.content: Wait for an email or call (if you leave a phone number)

steps.title: Make the people do the heavy lifting, not you.
steps.content: Make the people do the heavy lifting, not you.
